snippet.title: The Horus Heresy: Drop Assault Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the new trailer for The Horus Heresy: Drop Assault.

Choose a side in the intense civil war that erupted amongst the Emperor's Legions of Space Marines in the 31st millennium. Take on territorial conquests and battle your rivals in a fast-paced tactical setting.

Be sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel for more trailers and all the behind-the-scenes content you can get your hands on.

Need even more?

Visit our website www.dropassault.com
Interact with us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/DropAssault
Tweet us @DropAssault on Twitter: www.twitter.com/DropAssault
